attributes.action: Excessive unlawful BT Direct Debit charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned encourages the Deputy PM to support and sign this petition.

We the undersigned wish Gordon Brown to actively convince OFFCOM to regulate British Telecom's unlawful Direct Debit Charge. BT Should not be making excessive unlawful profit's in this manner.

rejection.details:
There is a petition (see below) against BT charging customers who pay by methods other than direct debit, is that what you mean?

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BTpenalties/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
